column5: Gorgeous pickeral Bill and congrats on your PB  About 10 years ago my son and I were camped on Adolphus Reach when that ESSROC freighter went by and she thru up such a huge wave that it tore my boat from the dock and shoved it right up on the beach  Luckily the only damage done was to the cleats that were ripped outta the dock.

My first ever trip to The BoQ was awesome. Unfortuately, due to circumstances beyond my control & an early sack time on Saturday night, I couldn't make it to Merlands from The Harbour Inn. I'll see most of you in February in Innisfil.....  Anyways, I took some cool shots of some of the many types of boats that could be seen all over The Reach on Saturday....  Trawlers....    Freighters...    Trawlers AND Freighters...    What was the other kind???  Oh yeah, TANKERS!!!!!    Yup, I think I'll try that place out again some day...hmmmm, do I have any more vac-time left....
That's a fat tanker Bill, Nice fish.
WoooHoooo!!! Bill! That is one Killer Wall-Ice Bubba!  You done good!Great pics too!
Nice shots Bill.  Congrats on your new PB too, beauty fish.
Nice walleye Bill! I use to dodge the barges down on the Ohio River years ago.  Whopper
Great Job Billy, congrats on the PB !!
Some nice pics tho' thx for sharing
Nice 'eye!  dk
Nice pics Bill, Thanks. It's amazing to be out on the water beside those big boats.
Nice tanker!  With that smile, you look like a seriously happy man!!
Thanks for the pic's Bill and yup thats a nice fish...

I wondered if you were going to meander over Bill.  Too bad you couldn't get your arse outta bed   Alot of people at Merland were a little tired on Saturday night too.  Beauty fish bud.  Congrats.  Joey
Oh Yeah!!
That's a Behemoth Tanker Bill!  H.M.S. Wall-Eye.  Shweet!
Great report....nice boats....AWESOME FISH!!!

LOL Bill...trawlers, freighters and tankers!! Beauty fish bud. Wonder how many planner lines they get each year..."security/security/security...the cement ship XYZ is leaving the picton dock in 10 minutes...we can't stop..we can't turn...so get the...out of the way NOW!"
Nice fish Bill!!! DId anyone else think they were in a Lund commercial on the weekend? Wow, so many guys runnin Lunds! HH
Nice "Tanker" Bill!
LOL, Bill that was a cool pic,  Great too have you out...

Yep...I just hope I don't drive mine like all the ones we went head to head with....crowding us into the shoreline...cutting us off to the point I could bang my planner board off their transom etc. I'm gonna Krazy Glue exacto knife refill blades to the front edge of my boards for next year.
A knife on the front of the boards eh?  Now that's a great tip!    There certainly were a few idiots doing that Wayne.  Why can't we all just get along.
wow nice fish

ya i was right in front of the ferry when that huge tanker went right by me about 200ft away i made sure to get right the hell out of his way thats for sure......   the nerve of him to screw up my trolling direction  ....lol....lol

The first Freighter on Sat. was really movin'....  Being the rookies we are, we had to start our turn real early when we saw him comin', full steam ahead....  The 2nd Freighter was much easier to deal with. I thought it was kinda neat to be sharin' the water with these guys.....
Great post and fish!  cheers,  ehg
